website_summaries.verdict: The Ryka Impulse received mostly positive reviews from the owners. The comfort it delivered earned tons of praises. The available width options and the lightweight and breathable characteristics of the footwear were also received well. However, there were a few shoppers who thought that the wide version was still too narrow and that the foam insert was subpar. But in the end, it came highly recommended by those who are always on their feet because of the comfort it provided.
pros: A vast majority of the owners raved about how comfortable the Ryka Impulse was for whole day wear and that it even helped relieve foot and back pains
The fit and length measurement of the trainer pleased a high number of consumers
they liked that it was available in a wide option
Numerous people commented that the shoe felt very light on their foot, an experience akin to wearing slippers
The style and color combinations delighted plenty of reviewers
Multiple buyers were happy with the affordable price of the merchandise
Several wearers praised the breathable upper because it kept their feet fresh throughout the day
The arch support in this product was deemed satisfactory by some shoppers
A few users appreciated that this model accommodated the use of custom orthotics
cons: A small number of testers were disappointed with the Memory Foam insole because it was too thin and deteriorated too quickly
A minority of purchasers complained that the wide version of the Ryka Impulse was still too narrow for them
The high collar at the back caused chafing and blisters for more than a few critics
The arch support was lacking, according to some commenters

customer_reviews.title: I can order Rykas and know that they will be comfortable and fit
customer_reviews.text: Wide width with narrower heel box, which is hard to find. Light weight. Deep enough to accommodate an arch support orthotic. I can order Rykas and know that they will be comfortable and fit. I no longer haven’t to try on dozens of shoes at multiple stores to find shoes that actually fit and at a reasonable price. Just a bit disappointed that the memory foam foot liner is thinner and inferior to the ones in my Ryka “Hailey” training shoe that I purchased in December of 2016. I will definitely purchase Rykas again, although I’ll have buy a replacement foot liner for this pair and the next if they don’t improve the quality.
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Great Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great walking shoe. Very light weight and seems well made. I've had them a week and have logged about 45 miles and they are good so far. I did have to switch socks to accommodate the lip on the rear of the heel so that it doesn't rub. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyT

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but don’t go the mile!
customer_reviews.text: Small toe box and a bad seam that runs right over my little toe. However the worst part is the “memory foam” soles. In just two days, mine have left residue all over my socks and they are already showing signs of deterioration. So much for so called walking shoes. And I wore them on light days to break them in. I typically walk 20k steps a day. The two days I wore them, I did half that. Absolute garbage shoes. Will not buy Ryka again.
customer_reviews.author: Melody DeKorte

customer_reviews.title: I love my Ryka Impulse walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love my Ryka Impulse walking shoes. They are comfortable, true to fit, and obviously very fashionable as I have received many compliments on them. A couple of my friends tried mine on and said that they were definately going to order the very same shoe, even down to color. Being so reasonably priced is an immediate attraction. I need sufficent support when walking or being on my feet all day and I do get it from this shoe. Plan on ordering more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Carol from Va.

customer_reviews.title: Not like my other shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for work. I have bought this brand before. They're actually the best work shoes I've ever had. But these are terrible. They rub my foot in a bad way. I had to take them off Midway through my shift. And have somebody else bring me up shoes. I tried them again. While I was working a different job. Still the same response. I had to take them off. This is a great brand of shoes. I have several pair. That I've had for years. It's just this particular one
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Toes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. The generous toe box in these shoes allow room for my my longer second toes. My podiatrist told me that 50% of all people have second toes that are longer than big toes, so there must be plenty of people who will enjoy this feature. I also liked that the heel is a bit narrower than most athletic shoes. This is also a feature that suits me. So, I will be looking for Amazon's next great deal on Ryka shoes.
customer_reviews.author: jsue2U

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe and great fit
customer_reviews.text: Ryka has never disappointed. The fit is perfect, the colors are fun, and I don't feel as though I've gained ten pounds by wearing these shoes! They are breathable, light-weight, and has great arch support as well as a comfortable memory foam bottom. My feet don't hurt after a three mile walk.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe ever...but sole wore out in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Ninety percent of my shoes are Clarks, size 10. I bought these based on reviews and found them the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn--even lighter and better fitting than my beloved Clarks. But they barely lasted 6 months and now have holes at ball of foot. I'd buy them again in a heartbeat tho--they are that comfy. Note that I am a large woman and that undoubtedly played a role in the sole wearing out too soon. Disappointing tradeoff for air-light, perfect fitting shoes.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Kinda hard.
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes, but are somewhat hard. I'm putting better memory foam in them. Insoles not removable so have to tear out original ones. Or put something on top of original.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Marie wagner

customer_reviews.title: Made for women - and it's obvious!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Ryka's. They fit beautifully with plenty of toe room and no slippage at the heel. I'm 81 years young, and I won't buy any other brand. The tread is good and solid. I feel as though they keep me safe from slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: no arch support at all!
customer_reviews.text: no arch support whatsoever. I think only converse have a flatter footbed. buyer beware if you have plantar fasciitis and need arch support! otherwise they are comfortable and lightweight. fit as expected, cute shoes. the stitching seems good quality. with inserts they'll probably be fine
customer_reviews.author: Marie Estes

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for long term standing
customer_reviews.text: Ryka shoes have been steadily declining over the years. I recently bought some that are very comfortable so I decided to give these a try. This is not a good shoe. After a short while wearing them the bottom of my feet start to hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are lightweight and comfortable. I also like the navy blue and pink color. Look great with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Boushelle

customer_reviews.title: Would buy another pair
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They fit great. Arch support is good. They are as light as air. Seems well made. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: vicky french

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a comfortable fit and well made. My only disappointment is that the ball of the foot could be cushioned better.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: THese were everything I wanted in my Ryka ! The right sneaker is 1/8" higher at the back which caused it to rub above my heel. No matter what I tried this still happened. I'm hopeful to get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: So far I LOVE these Shoes!! I've only walked around the house a few times but they are one of the most comfortable shoes I've worn! I plan on wearing these on walks and maybe to the gym, we'll see how they hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Rose

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and ever since I purchased my first pair of Ryka walking shoes, my feet are happy again! These are so comfortable, after wearing them for 10 hours, I sometimes forget that I have them on when I arrive home, highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Fine

customer_reviews.title: They fit wonderfully until I got a tailors bunion
customer_reviews.text: They fit wonderfully until I got a tailors bunion. I had to switch to wide. But at least these went to Puerto Rico.
customer_reviews.author: Kiko

customer_reviews.title: Designed by women for a woman's foot
customer_reviews.text: I won't wear any other tennis shoe, since I started wearing Ryka's 5yrs. ago. Great arch support for my plantar fasciitis feet. Wide toe area, and narrow heel area feet by feet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Pat S

customer_reviews.title: No cushion
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Rykas but this shoe hardly has any cushion especially for walking shoes. I threw the box away because I thought I would love them but I would love to return them. I don't have the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for running errands
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of shoes to run errands and take walks around the neighborhood. These work great for just that. They're light, comfortable, and have great air flow. I wouldn't recommend these for long distances or anything too strenuous. The only issue I have is that the traction isn't the best. I haven't had any issues with slipping, but just be aware that these might not be great in slippery conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Megan L.

customer_reviews.title: Toe box is roomy so if you have narrow feet it might seem big.
customer_reviews.text: Buying without trying on is always a gamble but for the price I thought I would try. I found for my feet that the toe box was too wide but the rest fit. I would have liked more cushioning inside. I ended up sending them back, loved the look but just not for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Cute and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely snug but they will stretch to my feet over time so that's not a problem! I got them in size 8. I like how they are lightweight, too. The design is nice as well, the blue and the pink go well together. I am happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: OMG I Love these walking shoes, so comfortable and great support that my knees and lower back quit hurting. I walk now with no pain wooooohooooo. That I just now bought a second pair. PLEASE keep these in stock and I will buy more. Tytyty
customer_reviews.author: Chichigirl

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an older pair of Ryka sneakers. I wear them for work in a kitchen where I'm on my feet for 8 hours a day. They are comfortable and very light weight. Fit is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe very light weight.. Runs a little small as I find most Ryka shoes do. Great price. Nice color combination!
customer_reviews.author: beri girl

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: The bottom wears out quickly for a walking shoe. A month and a half has gone by and I am looking for another pair. Otherwise the fit and comfort is great
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've had foot problems for over 40 years & therefore am quite picky about fit & comfort. These sneaks are awesome for long walks -- especially when walking miles while on vaca.
customer_reviews.author: CathyM

customer_reviews.title: Not much cushioning and kind of flat
customer_reviews.text: I just took these out of the box. Bought them with another pair of Rykas. 9W is true to size and roomy in the toe box. I don't know if this is a Ryka thing, but these are pretty hard. Not cushioned very much in the heel or arch. They might work out very well with inserts though.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Love my Impulse shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. I had a pair before and hadn't been able to find anymore. I'm so excited that I found them.
customer_reviews.author: Joan K Brown

customer_reviews.title: I thought they were fake Rykas
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Ryka for years and I've never had as cheap of quality of shoe as this pair. No padding in the sole or around the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Liza C

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! I ordered them when I saw that they were wide in the foot but not in the heel. Other reviews mentioned that so that’s why I tried them. They are a little more lightweight than I expected but for me that’s been good.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen J. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, light weight tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Very comfortable and cute. They are super light weight and that is nice too
customer_reviews.author: Terig

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect price, perfect fit, and have held up for my standing work and daily walking. Would def recommend and but again.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie B

customer_reviews.title: Shoes made for women!
customer_reviews.text: Since the first time I tried on Ryka's I've been hooked! I LOVE their shoes! They fit beautifully, they give my feet all the support they need and they're super comfy - and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I joined a gym and use the treadmill and these are wonderful shoes. The extra in the heal is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: duckie

customer_reviews.title: Barely any sole to speak of.
customer_reviews.text: There is barely any material on the sole of the shoe. I have bought and worn many pairs of Ryka's in the past and logged well over 400 miles in them - and those sneakers look better than these do after 75 miles on sidewalks.
customer_reviews.author: damekate

customer_reviews.title: Love Ryka Sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable sneakers I have ever found, absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G. Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes for working out, walking, jogging
customer_reviews.text: Love Ryka products!! Best value out there. Good looking, well made, great color choices. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: lmf

customer_reviews.title: I have loved them. This one is no disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Ever since the first time I bought Ryka shoes, I have loved them. This one is no disappointment. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: pookiua

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These look cute, but there very hard on the bottom with no arch support or any real comfort at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. F.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great support
customer_reviews.text: Super light that is nice but I have bad feet and they didn't have enough support for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: No arch walking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: This shoe does not have a good arch support for a walking shoe!!! I have always bought Ryka Sneakers and never had an issue until I purchased these😞 Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: medium arch support and a good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, medium arch support and a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nori

customer_reviews.title: Horrible for Ryka.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality for Ryka.Arch of shoe was in 2 different places! No padding,HORRIBLE! Seller was horrible as WELL-STOCKED AWAY FROM ZAPPOS SHOES!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love This shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair l ordered.Made for ladies Recommend this shoe brand/
customer_reviews.author: Donna Peden

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is made better
customer_reviews.text: The best thing they changed there sole on the bottom. I bought two pairs last year and the small glued on inserts all came off.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Davies

customer_reviews.title: My rykas feel like slippers!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable I can not believe I waited so long to try them! The fit is great and I can not say enough about the comfort of the shoes. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: cindy kropidlowski

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand! Great price and good quality. Perfect for working out. This is my fourth pair
customer_reviews.author: Tina vertefeuille

customer_reviews.title: They do look great.
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam is not as thick as I had wanted. They do look great.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. Good fit. Fast delivery. I love shopping on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, Ryka's are great walking shoes. I have a couple different pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: They are styled and made just for women
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had more of a arch support! But I love them anyway!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong, great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love Ryka shoes, they fit and feel great right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a wide and it was perfect. The toe box gave me ample room to wiggle my toes.
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers. Very comfortable and the memory foam is just enough for great cushion. I use them for zumba, cardio, and muscle classes at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: She loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfectly! Bought them 4 my mom. She loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Lopez

customer_reviews.title: MKW
customer_reviews.text: I haven't wore Ryka for several years, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They Fit perfect! Thank you. The best shoes I could ever wear doing the work I do
customer_reviews.author: SheyShey

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Comfortable and feet don't hurt after long day on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits fine in my size. Says it's memory foam, but feels like you're walking on cardboard. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Haley

customer_reviews.title: Absolute comfort!!
customer_reviews.text: I live the shoes, I bought a second pair , absolutely comfort, recommend, to any one that experienced foot pain!
customer_reviews.author: pedigo95

customer_reviews.title: Excellent walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable walking shoes - this is my 3rd pair of this maker, always great quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heel is narrow
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was made for a third party it doesn’t have the wide heel and isn’t as stable as the first shoe I bought
customer_reviews.author: Terri Cennerazzotc

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, yet comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Rather disappointed, as these shoes fit great, feel very comfortable, yet fell apart upon the third use. Sad...
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lankow

customer_reviews.title: Best women’s walking shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new pair of white walking shoes...Ryka never disappoints!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your brand in my case.
customer_reviews.text: As I had bought this bran before. I was sure I would love them! And I do. Done quite a bit of walking in the already. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My cousin reccommended Ryka and I'm in love with them.
customer_reviews.author: Reese Cup

customer_reviews.title: fake
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very poor quality. They are Chinese made knock-offs copies. I could tell after the first time wearing the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe for the money!!! Fit as expected. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this brand. They are so comfortable and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Lodato

customer_reviews.title: I Love Ryka!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing Ryka for years~they have yet to let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie52

customer_reviews.title: Ryka
customer_reviews.text: Ryka shoes are awesome comfortable walking and standing all day. Second pair:)
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and long-lasting!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of RYKA shoes. My previous pair lasted 7 years! I love them. Comfy and cute.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. Shull

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I own over 15 pairs of these shoes. I buy them in wide due to bunions, walk over 5 miles a day and never any blisters!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand atheletic shoe for women,they never slip because they are made for a woman's foot.I plan to use these a lot. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: suzmoo

product_meta.title: Ryka womens E9804M1 Impulse
product_meta.description: Walk with purpose along with your style! Textile and mesh upper. Lace-up closure. Brand logo hits throughout. Soft fabric lining and footbed. Rubber outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 7 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Breathable mesh with leather and synthetic overlays.
Two layer insole features EVA base with Memory Foam top layer.
Compression molded EVA midsole with TPU heel clip.
